publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4327.1 Mr Brian Monteith: Stirling Schools PPP—As an amendment to motion (S2M-4327) in the name of Dr Sylvia Jackson, leave out from "congratulates" to end and insert "is alarmed that Stirling Council and the Scottish Executive have financed the Stirling schools PPP contract on a flawed and unsound basis which has already led to cuts in children’s services of around £1 million and will lead to further increases in council tax over the next 30 years in order to make up a £30 million shortfall in funding." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-4327.1 Stirling Schools PPP (lodged on 10 May 2006) Murdo Fraser*, Alex Johnstone*

S2M-4327.1 Mr Brian Monteith: Stirling Schools PPP—As an amendment to motion (S2M-4327) in the name of Dr Sylvia Jackson, leave out from "congratulates" to end and insert "is alarmed that Stirling Council and the Scottish Executive have financed the Stirling schools PPP contract on a flawed and unsound basis which has already led to cuts in children’s services of around £1 million and will lead to further increases in council tax over the next 30 years in order to make up a £30 million shortfall in funding." Supported by: Murdo Fraser, Alex Johnstone, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-4327.1 Stirling Schools PPP (lodged on 10 May 2006) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S2M-4327.1 Stirling Schools PPP (lodged on 10 May 2006) Mr David Davidson* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
S2M-4327.1 Stirling Schools PPP (lodged on 10 May 2006) Dr Jean Turner*, Mrs Nanette Milne*
